titles.title: Segal AmeriCorps Education Award Tax Relief Act of 2011
Segal AmeriCorps Education Award Tax Relief Act of 2011
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide an exclusion from gross income for AmeriCorps educational awards.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Segal AmeriCorps Education Award Tax Relief Act of 2011 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income any AmeriCorps educational awards provided under the National and Community Service Act of 1990.
